name: Grasp Of The Oni
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] logra agarrar una de las muñecas de [TargetName] en un poderoso agarre, y antes de [TargetHeOrShe] puede reaccionar [TargetHisOrHer] Arm se ve obligado a [TargetHisOrHer] a retroceder, mientras [AttackerHeOrShe] se mueve detrás de [TargetHimOrHer]!| N | [AttackerName] se maneja fácilmente para atrapar la otra muñeca de [TargetName] y obliga a ambas muñecas [TargetHisOrHer] a una comprensión ajustada, y usa [AttackerHeOrShe] brazo libre para comenzar a burlarse del cuerpo de [TargetName], todo mientras presiona[AttackerHisOrHer] senos considerables contra la espalda de [TargetName]!
statusMiss: [AttackerName] reaches forward to grab ahold of one of [TargetName]'s wrists, but [TargetHeOrShe] manage to avoid the oni's grasping hand!
restraintEscaped: [TargetName] manages get free of [AttackerName]'s rough hold!
restraintEscapedFail: But [TargetName] can't get free of [AttackerName]'s rough  hold!
